sect1.title: Internal Component Design
sect1.para:
The component Identifications is splitted into Many modules . Refer "FileList" (Activity Diagrams) for more information. For Example :
GW_ProgPreconditions
VW_AppSWVerNum
SWCL_SoftwareCluster
VWLogicalSWBlockLockVal etc.. The architectural overview of the component is described within the SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect:
VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.Identifcations
The static and dynamic SW architecture can be found in EA :
VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.Identifcations.Static
VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.Identifcations.Dynamic

sect1.title: Requirements Allocation
sect1.para: The component covers requirement present in the module 5.SWR_ICAS1_BSW. The requirements present in chapter 2.19.5 Identifications is covered by this component. The Requirements traceability in SWA can be found in EA in the following location: VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.Identifcations.Requirements traceability

sect1.title: Software Unit Interfaces
sect1.para: Identifications are splitted to many SW components, but there is no interfaces between them.

sect1.title: Software Unit Interaction
sect1.para: Identifications are splitted to many SW components ,but there is no interaction between them.

listitem.para: ASAM_ODXFileVersion, BootloaderTPBlocksize, DID_0506, DID_f1a4, DID_f1a8, DID_f1a9, DID_f1ae, DID_f1e0, ECUSerialNumber and FDS_ProjectData file Dynamic behaviour:

GW_ApplDataSetIdStatus file, GW_ASAM_ODX_FileIdent file, GW_AUTOSAR_StdApplSoftId file, GW_BusIdSubbTeiln, GW_CompList_Identification, GW_CompList_Identification_22, GW_DowngradeProtectionVersions, GW_ECU_ProgInfo, GW_FindDateLogicSoftBlock, GW_IstvSubbTeiln, GW_ProgPreconditions, GW_Softwarehersteller_ID, GW_SollvSubbTeiln, GW_SubSysNodeAddr and GW_VW_ECU_HwVersionNum Dynamic behaviour:
SWCL_Ereignisspeicher, SWCL_Istverbau, SWCL_SoftwareCluster, SWCL_Sollverbau and SWCO_IdentificationCbk Dynamic behaviour:

VW_AppSWVerNum, VW_ClrDiagInfoDateFunct, VW_DataSetName, VW_DataSetNumECUDataContNum, VW_DataSetVersionNumber, VW_ECUHardwareNumber, VW_FAZIT_Identification_String, VW_SparePartNumber, VW_SystemNameOrEngineType, VW_WorkshopSysName, VWLogicalSWBlockLockVal, VWProgAttemptCounter Dynamic behaviour:

VWSlaveCondVar, VWSlaveECU_HW_VN, VWSlaveECU_SN, VWSlaveFAZIT_ID_Str, VWSlaveHW_Nr, VWSlaveSparePN, VWSlaveSW_VN, VWSlaveSysNameOrEngineType Dynamic behaviour
GW_BusmasterDescription, GW_JIT_MioNumber_Identification, GW_LogSoftBlockVersion, GW_ModeOf_Protection_of_Vehicle_Diagnosis, GW_OBD_ClassServer, GW_TechSpecVersion, VW_system_firmware_versions Dynamic behaviour

sect1.title: Data flow Diagram
sect1.para: The data flow diagram of the Identifications SW unit is described here. The data flows from Identifications are depicted with green arrows and the data flows to Identifications are depicted with the red arrows.

For detailed data flow between Identifications and external modules, the data flow diagram at the following location in EA can be referred - VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.Identifcations.Dynamic
Tasks
There are no Tasks intiated by Identifications directly. Interrupts
There is no interrupts directly handled by Identifications. Events
There are no cyclic Events executed in Identifications. Operating Modes
There is no special Operating modes

The component need to work in the following power modes:
under voltage is below 5500.
Normal voltage between 5500+500 to 18500-500.
over volatge is above 18500.
As it need to Read or Write DID during under voltage and over voltage. Exception and Error Handling
No DTC or DEM events.. Synchronization
Since the component is designed to run on a single core, In the case where data needs to be shared to other cores, RTE_LIGHT is used.

entry.para: simple wrapper is required to exchange data
Number of dependencies is greater than or equal to 4 and less than 7
Not ASIL and not a stack and not new and intraction is rated low
Number of algorithms and interaction is rated medium
